meanings.sent1: The robot misfeeds the parts into the assembly line.
meanings.sent2: Sometimes, the printer misfeeds the paper and jams.
meanings.sent3: The hungry puppy misfeeds on the kibble and leaves a mess.
meanings.sent4: Her mind misfeeds on negative thoughts, affecting her mood.
meanings.sent5: The gardener misfeeds the plants with too much fertilizer, causing them to wither.

meanings.definition: A failure of a machine to feed properly.
meanings.sent1: The misfeeds of the printer caused delays in the office.
meanings.sent2: The technician fixed the misfeeds in the conveyor belt.
meanings.sent3: The misfeeds in the vending machine led to snacks getting stuck.
meanings.sent4: The misfeeds of information in the system resulted in errors.
meanings.sent5: The misfeeds of the sewing machine ruined the fabric.
